meanings.definition: To confer a benefit or advantage upon
meanings.sent1: She was beneficing her community by volunteering at the local shelter.
meanings.sent2: The company was beneficing from the new tax incentives.
meanings.sent3: The cat was beneficing from the warm sunbeam coming through the window.
meanings.sent4: The flowers were beneficing from the recent rainfall, blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The students were beneficing from the extra tutoring sessions, improving their grades.

meanings.definition: The act of bestowing a benefit or advantage
meanings.sent1: The beneficing of scholarships to deserving students was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The beneficing of the new playground brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent3: The beneficing of extra vacation days was a pleasant surprise for the employees.
meanings.sent4: The beneficing of good health is often taken for granted until it is lost.
meanings.sent5: The beneficing of a supportive family can make all the difference in one's life.
